title: Forever and Always (Taylor's Version)
description:
Taylor Swift normally doesn't tell all, but she did in this song! This song caused an infamous confession on the Ellen show, a couple of back-and-forth song rebuttals and eventually, remorse. Lacey, Nick, Amy and Ana break down all of the juicy song details.
What do you think about this song? What did we miss? Let us know!
